### Tender Description
The Correctional Services Canada (CSC) requires the services of a psychologist to provide psychodiagnostic and cognitive assessments to inmates in regional Ontario facilities. 

**Objectives:**
* Provide psychodiagnostic and cognitive assessments to inmates as required by the Project Authority.
* Conduct a maximum of 180 evaluations per year.

**Products Delivered:**
* A maximum of 180 psychodiagnostic and cognitive evaluations per year.

**Services Requirements:**
* Consider gender, cultural, religious, and linguistic differences and be responsive to the special needs of women and Indigenous peoples.
* Provide services in compliance with federal and provincial legislation and standards, provincial and national guidelines, and CSC Policy/Guidelines.
* Consult with the Project Authority to ensure that all psychological practices are consistent with relevant and most current legislation, practice standards, and policies.

**Timing:**
* Timeliness of report submission will be monitored by the Project Authority and will form part of the evaluation of the contractor's work.

**Language:**
* All work must be performed in English.
